Files
file Client.java
This is the excecutable class Client. This class contains a thread to send data to the server, and one thead to receive data from server.
file DirectChat.java
This class defines the datastructure DirectChat. A direct-chat is a kind of ChatRoom, but only available between two users.
file DirectMessage.java
This class represents a direct message between two users, or the server and a single user.
file Log.java
This class discribes the datastructure Log. It will be used in Server to represent log entrys out of an external log file.
file Message.java
this class discribes the datastructure of a message This class contains the type of a message ATTENTION: this type is not runnable!!!! -> contains the Constructor get Data from farams in Relation message := {type:int, Date:String, Time:String, Content:String, userId:int, isDelted:boolean} -> also contains getter methods for all attributes
file MyFileHandler.java
This class contains methods, to parse and returns safed data from device.
file Room.java
This class discribes a datastructure for a chat-room.
file Server.java
this class discribes the excecutable type Server
file User.java
This class discribes the User data and contains the USer Socket and and executable protocolls.
